description: Ethical Hacking an authorized process for finding and exploiting vulnerabilities to improve the security posture of systems and applications. Join this hands-on workshop to get an introduction to ethical hacking and learn actionable best practices for getting started. You'll see a step-by-step demo of ethical hacking with live Q&A. Then, in the hands-on portion of the lab, you'll practice ethical hacking on vulnerable demo applications, find and exploit vulnerabilities, and learn about responsible disclosure.
title: Ethical Hacking 101 Workshop
